15441.description: Port for ZeroNet network connection. You may need to open it (TCP and UDP) on your firewall. Suggested default: 15441.
15441.label: Listening port

43110.description: ZeroNet Web UI Port. Default is 43110
43110.label: WebUI port

/root/data.description: Choose a share for all ZeroNet data (sites, profiles, etc)
/root/data.label: Data Storage

ENABLE_TOR.description: Specify whether or not to enable Tor. Must be 'true' or 'false'.
ENABLE_TOR.label: ENABLE_TOR

ZeroNet.description: Decentralized websites using Bitcoin crypto and the BitTorrent network - https://zeronet.io
